src:
Aspires nyköpta spelmotor tecknar avtal i USA
Aspires nyförvärvade spelmotor Pariplay har ingått ett betydande avtal med operatören 888casino som avser amerikanska delstaten New Jersey. Detta utgör därmed de första stegen för Aspire Global in på den reglerade USA-marknaden. 
01 Nov 2019, 09:53 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Aspire's newly purchased gaming engine signs agreement in the US
Aspire's newly acquired gaming engine Pariplay has entered into a significant agreement with the 888casino operator, which concerns the US state of New Jersey. This represents the first steps for Aspire Global in the regulated US market.
01 Nov 2019, 09:53 by News Agency Direct
